text: Soorya Puthrikal is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Suresh Menon and starring Jayaram and Jayabharathi in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_soorya-puthrikal-.htm ==Cast== * Jayabharathi * Innocent * Jayaram * Divya Unni * Jagadish * Narendra Prasad ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Soorya Puthrikal
